Articles.Content:
So I haven't posted anything on here in quite some time, but I still have been playing ksp a lot and this is just something I finished building that i wanted to share with you guys.

To use:

Throttle up all the way and pitch your nose back until you leave the runway, once airborne cut throttle and throttle up very slightly I prefer between 10-15% throttle. Some trimming is required as you use the fuel and the center of mass changes, other than that fly like a normal plane.

Hope you enjoy!

Bideo:

Edit: Sorry the video is not saturated well, I should of changed that before uploading.

Download:

http://www./download/loq3yf3nhkvxqj2/Mini_Bi_Plane_2.craft

I prefer my planes straight Gah, terrible joke. (still, 'biplane' is one word, no space. just... for future reference)

It's a neat lil' thing. Looking good, too. Wonder if it'll fly in the updated aerodynamics.

Yea I like it a lot, I want to see the updated physics, Because i did have to break from the slightly more aesthetic design of having the wings farther forward on the plane, also the lack of a propeller because of the stock only parts. Also I have Biplane spelled correctly in the video but not in the post title =/
It's a great little plane! I had fun flying it, (and crashing it).
